answerText: Ali Baba[10] In another story, a man of this profession finds a genie while working. The bitter genie at first offers him a choice of deaths, but after being trapped again, gives him helpful gifts.
heading: NASAT |2013 | 9 | 20 | Literature | World | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: For 10 points each, name these characters from the Arabian Nights [10] This man is served by Morgiana, who saves him after he gets into trouble for knowing how to get into a secret cave used by the Forty Thieves.
